nodes.text: A male member of the Evocii species lived well before the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire. One of the Evocii's kinsmen, Ejal, led his fellow Evocii in an uprising against the Hutt species, who had stolen the Evocii's homeworld of Nal Hutta and used the Evocii as cheap labor. However, Ejal's kinsman betrayed Ejal to the Hutts, who brutally killed the revolutionary and awarded the traitor with both his freedom and riches.
Ejal and his kinsman were mentioned in the Codex entry for the Evocii species in the 2011 video game Star Wars: The Old Republic.
